intro: Anthurium cojimiesense, commonly known as the Cojimiesense arrowhead, is a tropical plant native to Ecuador. It belongs to the Araceae family and is characterized by its distinctive arrow-shaped leaves. The plant produces striking spathes that can range in color from white to red, depending on the variety. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and requires well-draining soil. Anthurium cojimiesense is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively easy to care for in the right conditions.
